001package io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.base;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.annotation.Odyssey;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.config.TestConfig;
005import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.log.LogQuest;
006import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.quest.QuestHolder;
007import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.quest.SuperQuest;
008import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.storage.DataExtractor;
009import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;
010import org.apache.logging.log4j.core.LoggerContext;
011import org.junit.jupiter.api.Tag;
012import org.springframework.boot.test.context.SpringBootTest;
013
014import static io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.util.PropertiesUtil.addSystemProperties;
015
016/**
017 * Base test class providing foundational test setup and utilities.
018 *
019 * <p>This class serves as the base for all test classes, handling global test configurations,
020 * logging setup, and utility methods for retrieving stored test data.
021 * It ensures consistent test initialization and provides convenience methods
022 * for accessing stored test artifacts.
023 *
024 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
025 */
026@Odyssey
027@SpringBootTest(
028      classes = {TestConfig.class},
029      webEnvironment = SpringBootTest.WebEnvironment.NONE
030)
031@Tag("exclude-from-verify")
032public class BaseQuest {
033
034   private static final String RETRIEVAL_LOG_TEMPLATE = "Fetching data from storage by key: '{}' and type: '{}'";
035
036   static {
037      synchronized (BaseQuest.class) {
038         addSystemProperties();
039         LoggerContext context = (LoggerContext) LogManager.getContext(false);
040         context.reconfigure();
041      }
042   }
043
044   /**
045    * Retrieves stored test data by key.
046    *
047    * @param key   The key identifying the stored data.
048    * @param clazz The expected type of the retrieved object.
049    * @param <T>   The type parameter corresponding to the retrieved object.
050    * @return The stored test data of the specified type.
051    */
052   protected <T> T retrieve(Enum<?> key, Class<T> clazz) {
053      SuperQuest quest = QuestHolder.get();
054      LogQuest.extended(RETRIEVAL_LOG_TEMPLATE, key.name(), clazz.getName());
055      return quest.getStorage().get(key, clazz);
056   }
057
058   /**
059    * Retrieves stored test data from a sub-key.
060    *
061    * @param subKey The sub-key identifying the data subset.
062    * @param key    The key identifying the stored data.
063    * @param clazz  The expected type of the retrieved object.
064    * @param <T>    The type parameter corresponding to the retrieved object.
065    * @return The stored test data from the specified sub-key.
066    */
067   protected <T> T retrieve(Enum<?> subKey, Enum<?> key, Class<T> clazz) {
068      SuperQuest quest = QuestHolder.get();
069      LogQuest.extended(RETRIEVAL_LOG_TEMPLATE, key.name(), clazz.getName());
070      return quest.getStorage().sub(subKey).get(key, clazz);
071   }
072
073   /**
074    * Retrieves test data using a {@code DataExtractor}.
075    *
076    * @param extractor The data extractor to retrieve test data.
077    * @param clazz     The expected type of the retrieved object.
078    * @param <T>       The type parameter corresponding to the retrieved object.
079    * @return The extracted test data of the specified type.
080    */
081   protected <T> T retrieve(DataExtractor<T> extractor, Class<T> clazz) {
082      SuperQuest quest = QuestHolder.get();
083      LogQuest.extended(RETRIEVAL_LOG_TEMPLATE, extractor.getKey().name(),
084            clazz.getName());
085      return quest.getStorage().get(extractor, clazz);
086   }
087
088   /**
089    * Retrieves test data using a {@code DataExtractor} at a specified index.
090    *
091    * @param extractor The data extractor to retrieve test data.
092    * @param index     The index of the extracted data.
093    * @param clazz     The expected type of the retrieved object.
094    * @param <T>       The type parameter corresponding to the retrieved object.
095    * @return The extracted test data of the specified type at the given index.
096    */
097   protected <T> T retrieve(DataExtractor<T> extractor, int index, Class<T> clazz) {
098      SuperQuest quest = QuestHolder.get();
099      LogQuest.extended(RETRIEVAL_LOG_TEMPLATE, extractor.getKey().name(),
100            clazz.getName());
101      return quest.getStorage().get(extractor, clazz, index);
102   }
103
104   /**
105    * Retrieves data that was stored by a test hook (e.g., DbHook or ApiHook).
106    *
107    * <p>This method looks up hook-scoped data using the provided key object and
108    * returns it as an instance of the specified class.</p>
109    *
110    * @param value the key object under which hook data was stored
111    * @param clazz the expected type of the retrieved data
112    * @param <T>   the type parameter of the returned data
113    * @return the hook-stored data, cast to {@code T}
114    */
115   protected <T> T hookData(Object value, Class<T> clazz) {
116      SuperQuest quest = QuestHolder.get();
117      LogQuest.extended(RETRIEVAL_LOG_TEMPLATE, value,
118            clazz.getName());
119      return quest.getStorage().getHookData(value, clazz);
120   }
121
122   /**
123    * Provides static utility methods for retrieving stored test data.
124    *
125    * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
126    */
127   public static final class DefaultStorage {
128
129
130      private DefaultStorage() {
131      }
132
133      /**
134       * Retrieves stored test data by key within a sub-storage context.
135       *
136       * @param key   The key identifying the stored data.
137       * @param clazz The expected type of the retrieved object.
138       * @param <T>   The type parameter corresponding to the retrieved object.
139       * @return The stored test data of the specified type.
140       */
141      public static <T> T retrieve(Enum<?> key, Class<T> clazz) {
142         SuperQuest quest = QuestHolder.get();
143         return quest.getStorage().sub().get(key, clazz);
144      }
145
146      /**
147       * Retrieves test data using a {@code DataExtractor} within a sub-storage context.
148       *
149       * @param extractor The data extractor to retrieve test data.
150       * @param clazz     The expected type of the retrieved object.
151       * @param <T>       The type parameter corresponding to the retrieved object.
152       * @return The extracted test data of the specified type.
153       */
154      public static <T> T retrieve(DataExtractor<T> extractor, Class<T> clazz) {
155         SuperQuest quest = QuestHolder.get();
156         return quest.getStorage().sub().get(extractor, clazz);
157      }
158
159   }
160
161}
